title: Skinsense
creator_credit: Peter Bence, Rob McCubbin and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: A general discussion on attaining and mantaining normal healthy skin. Includes haircare and shampoos, nailcare and general skincare, moisturisers, soaps, cosmetics and deodorants. The effects of sunshine on skin and protective behaviour are also covered.
